title: Phone audio to Bluetooth speakers
content:
I have Bluetooth enabled speakers paired to the phone. Media sound goes to them perfectly well, no issues. However I cannot get the audio from voice calls inbound or outbound to go to speakers. (I'm using the default phone app)

When I paired the speakers I granted them all permissions it asked for.

I can't find any option in the Phone app or System about voice call output. It always seems to just go to the phone's speakers.

Android 11, Bluetooth 5.

I think there must be a simple option I haven't selected but I can't find it. Anyone know?
